features.name: Influence Goals Management
features.description: Create, read, update, and delete influence scoring goals with 17 predefined goal types for tracking and scoring community interactions.
features.ui_location: Admin > Settings > Community Settings > Influence tab
test_scenarios: Create new influence goal with each of 17 goal types
Edit existing influence goal (update weight, value, min, max)
Delete influence goal with confirmation dialog
Verify duplicate GoalType validation error
Verify MinValue must be less than MaxValue validation
Verify Value must be between MinValue and MaxValue validation
Test negative number validation for all numeric fields
Verify required field validation for all fields
Cancel edit operation and verify no changes saved
Verify title auto-population from GoalType
Verify GoalType is locked after creation

features.name: Influence Goals Search and Pagination
features.description: Search, sort, and paginate through influence goals with configurable page sizes and multi-column sorting.
features.ui_location: Admin > Settings > Community Settings > Influence tab
test_scenarios: Search by goal type keyword
Search by title keyword
Verify case-insensitive search
Sort by GoalType ascending and descending
Sort by Weight ascending and descending
Sort by Value ascending and descending
Sort by MinValue ascending and descending
Sort by MaxValue ascending and descending
Navigate through pages with next/previous buttons
Change page size to 5, 10, 25, 50 items
Verify search throttling (500ms delay)
Verify empty search results message
